mapper.select: SELECT a.businessId,a.createdAt as applicationCreatedAt,a.paper,b.detailTypeName,c.name as userName,a.businessName,a.state FROM business a LEFT JOIN detail_type b on a.detailTypeId=b.detailTypeId LEFT JOIN user c on a.userId=c.userId ORDER BY a.businessId DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT a.businessId , a.createdAt as applicationCreatedAt , a.businessName , a.tel , c.name as userName , b.detailTypeName , ROUND(AVG(r.score),2) AS reviewScore , COUNT(r.reviewId) AS reviewNumbers FROM business a LEFT JOIN detail_type b ON a.detailTypeId = b.detailTypeId LEFT JOIN user c ON a.userId = c.userId LEFT JOIN product d ON a.businessId = d.businessId LEFT JOIN service s ON d.productId = s.productId LEFT JOIN review r ON s.serviceId = r.serviceId WHERE b.categoryId=#{categoryId} GROUP BY a.businessId, a.businessName, a.tel, c.name, b.detailTypeName ORDER BY a.businessId DESC

WITH latest_service AS ( SELECT b.userId, d.detailTypeName FROM service b LEFT JOIN product c ON b.productId = c.productId LEFT JOIN detail_type d ON c.detailTypeId = d.detailTypeId WHERE b.createdAt = ( SELECT MAX(b2.createdAt) FROM service b2 WHERE b2.userId = b.userId ) ) SELECT a.name AS userName, a.phone, ls.detailTypeName, COUNT(b.serviceId) AS serviceNumber, a.type as typeName, a.userId FROM user a LEFT JOIN service b ON a.userId = b.userId LEFT JOIN latest_service ls ON a.userId = ls.userId GROUP BY a.userId, a.name, a.phone, ls.detailTypeName, a.type ORDER BY a.userId DESC LIMIT 10 OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT c.categoryName, COALESCE(SUM(s.price), 0) AS totalPrice FROM category c LEFT JOIN detail_type d ON c.categoryId = d.categoryId LEFT JOIN product p ON d.detailTypeId = p.detailTypeId LEFT JOIN service s ON p.productId = s.productId AND s.paidAt BETWEEN '${month}-01 00:00:00' AND '${month}-${lastDay} 23:59:59' GROUP BY c.categoryName ORDER BY c.categoryId

SELECT c.categoryId, c.categoryName, JSON_ARRAYAGG( JSON_OBJECT( 'detailTypeId', d.detailTypeId, 'detailTypeName', d.detailTypeName, 'count', IFNULL(dtCounts.count, 0) ) ) AS detailTypeCounts FROM category c JOIN detail_type d ON c.categoryId = d.categoryId LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.detailTypeId, COUNT(b.businessId) AS count FROM business b GROUP BY b.detailTypeId ) dtCounts ON d.detailTypeId = dtCounts.detailTypeId GROUP BY c.categoryId, c.categoryName

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN s.paidAt BETWEEN '${beforeMonth}-01 00:00:00' AND '${beforeMonth}-${lastDay} 23:59:59' THEN s.paidAt END) / ${lastDay} AS pastPaidCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN s.paidAt BETWEEN '${targetMonth}-01 00:00:00' AND '${today} 23:59:59' THEN s.paidAt END) / ${dayOfMonth} AS nowPaidCount FROM service s

SELECT c.categoryName, AVG(r.score) AS avgScore, (SELECT AVG(score) FROM review) AS totalAvgScore FROM review r JOIN service s ON r.serviceId = s.serviceId JOIN product p ON p.productId = s.productId JOIN detail_type d ON d.detailTypeId = p.detailTypeId JOIN category c ON c.categoryId = d.categoryId GROUP BY c.categoryId, c.categoryName
SELECT COUNT(u.userId) FROM user u WHERE u.createdAt BETWEEN '${targetMonth}-01 00:00:00' AND '${today} 23:59:59'
SELECT b.businessName, b.createdAt FROM business b WHERE b.state = 100 ORDER BY b.createdAt DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN s.paidAt BETWEEN '${yesterday} 00:00:00' AND '${yesterday} 23:59:59' THEN s.serviceId END) AS yesterdayServiceCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN s.paidAt BETWEEN '${today} 00:00:00' AND '${today} 23:59:59' THEN s.serviceId END) AS todayServiceCount FROM Service s WHERE s.completed >= 6;

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN u.createdAt BETWEEN '${yesterday} 00:00:00' AND '${yesterday} 23:59:59' THEN u.userId END) AS yesterdayNewUserCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN u.createdAt BETWEEN '${today} 00:00:00' AND '${today} 23:59:59' THEN u.userId END) AS todayNewUserCount FROM User u

SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN b.approveAt BETWEEN '${yesterday} 00:00:00' AND '${yesterday} 23:59:59' THEN b.businessId END) AS yesterdayNewBusinessCount, COUNT(CASE WHEN b.approveAt BETWEEN '${today} 00:00:00' AND '${today} 23:59:59' THEN b.businessId END) AS todayNewBusinessCount FROM Business b
